00033 template <typename Array1, typename Array2, typename Array3, typename IndexType, typename ValueType, typename MemorySpace> class csr_matrix_view;

00088 template <typename IndexType, typename ValueType, class MemorySpace>
00089 class csr_matrix : public detail::matrix_base<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace,cusp::csr_format>
00090 {
00091   typedef cusp::detail::matrix_base<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace,cusp::csr_format> Parent;
00092   public:
00095     template<typename MemorySpace2>
00096     struct rebind { typedef cusp::csr_matrix<IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace2> type; };
00097     
00100     typedef typename cusp::array1d<IndexType, MemorySpace> row_offsets_array_type;
00101 
00104     typedef typename cusp::array1d<IndexType, MemorySpace> column_indices_array_type;
00105     
00108     typedef typename cusp::array1d<ValueType, MemorySpace> values_array_type;
00109     
00112     typedef typename cusp::csr_matrix<IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> container;
00113 
00116     typedef typename cusp::csr_matrix_view<typename row_offsets_array_type::view,
00117                                            typename column_indices_array_type::view,
00118                                            typename values_array_type::view,
00119                                            IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> view;
00120     
00123     typedef typename cusp::csr_matrix_view<typename row_offsets_array_type::const_view,
00124                                            typename column_indices_array_type::const_view,
00125                                            typename values_array_type::const_view,
00126                                            IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> const_view;
00127     
00130     row_offsets_array_type row_offsets;
00131     
00134     column_indices_array_type column_indices;
00135     
00138     values_array_type values;
00139 
00140 
00143     csr_matrix() {}
00144 
00151     csr_matrix(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t num_entries)
00152       : Parent(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries),
00153         row_offsets(num_rows + 1), column_indices(num_entries), values(num_entries) {}
00154 
00159     template <typename MatrixType>
00160     csr_matrix(const MatrixType& matrix);
00161     
00164     void resize(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t num_entries)
00165     {
00166       Parent::resize(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries);
00167       row_offsets.resize(num_rows + 1);
00168       column_indices.resize(num_entries);
00169       values.resize(num_entries);
00170     }
00171 
00176     void swap(csr_matrix& matrix)
00177     {
00178       Parent::swap(matrix);
00179       row_offsets.swap(matrix.row_offsets);
00180       column_indices.swap(matrix.column_indices);
00181       values.swap(matrix.values);
00182     }
00183     
00188     template <typename MatrixType>
00189     csr_matrix& operator=(const MatrixType& matrix);
00190 }; // class csr_matrix
00209 template <typename Array1,
00210           typename Array2,
00211           typename Array3,
00212           typename IndexType   = typename Array1::value_type,
00213           typename ValueType   = typename Array3::value_type,
00214           typename MemorySpace = typename cusp::minimum_space<typename Array1::memory_space, typename Array2::memory_space, typename Array3::memory_space>::type >
00215 class csr_matrix_view : public cusp::detail::matrix_base<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace,cusp::csr_format>
00216 {
00217   typedef cusp::detail::matrix_base<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace,cusp::csr_format> Parent;
00218   public:
00219     typedef Array1 row_offsets_array_type;
00220     typedef Array2 column_indices_array_type;
00221     typedef Array3 values_array_type;
00222     
00225     typedef typename cusp::csr_matrix<IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> container;
00226 
00229     typedef typename cusp::csr_matrix_view<Array1, Array2, Array3, IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> view;
00230 
00233     row_offsets_array_type row_offsets;
00234     
00237     column_indices_array_type column_indices;
00238     
00241     values_array_type values;
00242 
00243     // construct empty view
00244     csr_matrix_view(void)
00245       : Parent() {}
00246 
00247     // construct from existing CSR matrix or view
00248     template <typename Matrix>
00249     csr_matrix_view(Matrix& A)
00250       : Parent(A),
00251         row_offsets(A.row_offsets),
00252         column_indices(A.column_indices),
00253         values(A.values) {}
00254 
00255     // TODO check sizes here
00256     csr_matrix_view(size_t num_rows,
00257                     size_t num_cols,
00258                     size_t num_entries,
00259                     Array1 row_offsets,
00260                     Array2 column_indices,
00261                     Array3 values)
00262       : Parent(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries),
00263         row_offsets(row_offsets),
00264         column_indices(column_indices),
00265         values(values) {}
00266 
00269     void resize(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t num_entries)
00270     {
00271       Parent::resize(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries);
00272       row_offsets.resize(num_rows + 1);
00273       column_indices.resize(num_entries);
00274       values.resize(num_entries);
00275     }
00276 };

00280 template <typename Array1,
00281           typename Array2,
00282           typename Array3>
00283 csr_matrix_view<Array1,Array2,Array3>
00284 make_csr_matrix_view(size_t num_rows,
00285                      size_t num_cols,
00286                      size_t num_entries,
00287                      Array1 row_offsets,
00288                      Array2 column_indices,
00289                      Array3 values)
00290 {
00291   return csr_matrix_view<Array1,Array2,Array3>
00292     (num_rows, num_cols, num_entries,
00293      row_offsets, column_indices, values);
00294 }

00296 template <typename Array1,
00297           typename Array2,
00298           typename Array3,
00299           typename IndexType,
00300           typename ValueType,
00301           typename MemorySpace>
00302 csr_matrix_view<Array1,Array2,Array3,IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace>
00303 make_csr_matrix_view(const csr_matrix_view<Array1,Array2,Array3,IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace>& m)
00304 {
00305   return csr_matrix_view<Array1,Array2,Array3,IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace>(m);
00306 }
00307     
00308 template <typename IndexType, typename ValueType, class MemorySpace>
00309 typename csr_matrix<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace>::view
00310 make_csr_matrix_view(csr_matrix<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace>& m)
00311 {
00312   return make_csr_matrix_view
00313     (m.num_rows, m.num_cols, m.num_entries,
00314      make_array1d_view(m.row_offsets),
00315      make_array1d_view(m.column_indices),
00316      make_array1d_view(m.values));
00317 }
00318 
00319 template <typename IndexType, typename ValueType, class MemorySpace>
00320 typename csr_matrix<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace>::const_view
00321 make_csr_matrix_view(const csr_matrix<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace>& m)
00322 {
00323   return make_csr_matrix_view
00324     (m.num_rows, m.num_cols, m.num_entries,
00325      make_array1d_view(m.row_offsets),
00326      make_array1d_view(m.column_indices),
00327      make_array1d_view(m.values));
00328 }
